Letter.header1: EzCommerce Global Solutions Shall be informed of the following changes made to the manufacture of the material.
Letter.header2:
1.Changes in the site,Scale and Equipment.
2.Changes in the Specifications of raw material , Intermediates and Finished Products.
3.Changes in the Manufacturing Process.
Letter.header3: We Declare and certify that the product(s)__Ezc product__________________________(Product Name) manufactured at_____hyderabad_____________________(manufacturer name) contains no ingrediants of animal origin,no material derived from,or exposed to animal affected by, or under quarantine for transmitting animal spongiform encephalopathy(BSE).The products are produced in a facility where no animal ,animal product,animal byproducts,veterniary vaccines or animal pathogens are maintained and are packed in packaging that can be identified as to the nature of the products and the country of origin.
